catalog_info.title: Supervised Research
catalog_info.notes: Gonzalo Giribet and members of the Department Laboratory safety session required.
catalog_info.description: Course taken in one or more semesters to obtain credit for independent research, including research toward a senior thesis. Work should be directed by an OEB faculty member or have an OEB faculty sponsor. All students must submit registration materials for OEB 99r at the time of enrollment.
